meanings.sent2: The gothicism cathedral stood majestically against the dark sky.
meanings.sent3: The gothicism mansion looked spooky but elegant at the same time.
meanings.sent4: Her gothicism dress was like a shadow moving gracefully in the moonlight.
meanings.sent5: The gothicism architecture evoked a sense of mystery and grandeur.

meanings.sent2: She enjoyed reading gothicism stories late into the night.
